text: While we are under no obligation to do so (and while we typically delete your data immediately and permanently when you cancel), we may retain your data for up to one year after you have cancelled (in the form of off-site backups).
If you become aware of any violation of this Policy, you will immediately notify us and provide us with assistance, as requested, to stop or remedy the violation.
On some of our services, we use cookies to give you the best possible experience--such as to allow you to remain logged in instead of having to log in repeatedly.
We use the information we collect from individuals only to allow them to access and use our programs or to service their subscriptions.
